title: Brian blessed need to voice a champ !

embed.description: The optional Brian Blessed voiceover DLC pack for War of the Roses is now available.

body: That just an amazing voice !! It would be great addition to Runeterra, maybe as a zealous priest/paladin from Demacia !

replies.body: Love him.  But I always loved his comedic reads better.   I would certainly look at him if we had a gragas vgu.
Ohh I like this a lot !!
Never forget Boss Nass. He literally saved the face of all gungans from the evil clutches of Jar jar.
